summary.span: 指定應該從程式碼涵蓋範圍資訊排除的屬性程式碼。

span.span: Specifies that the attributed code should be excluded from code coverage information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在類別或結構中放置此屬性，是在程式碼涵蓋範圍資訊的集合中排除該類別或結構的所有成員。Placing this attribute on a class or a structure excludes all the members of that class or structure from the collection of code coverage information.
